item.description:
Grease The sing-a-long

 

5.2.12 UPDATE: The reservation is under Meetup, ask for that at the desk and they will lead you to the table.

Chunky's is dedicating the month of May to some of the greatest musicals of all time!  Let's join in on the fun for the 1st sing-a-long with our favorite characters on the big screen remastered in HD BluRay! You don't have to be a rock star to sing along and we are in luck the words will be right on the screen.

If you haven't seen Grease, a little about the movie: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. But when they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

Cost: To get into the movie FREE.

Ordering food: We will try to get separate checks, or a few people on each check, you pay for what you order, plus tax and tip.

If you can't make it at 6:00 but want to come, put that in your RSVP, if you are not there at the time you say so then your seat could be given to someone else.

If you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.  Please note the phone will be shut off 15 minutes before the movie starts.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  Thank you for paying your dues.

Looking forward to see you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the lobby waiting to get our ticket, then we will be in the theater if you come late and can't find us come in and find us.
item.name: Chunky's movie---Grease
